Safe and Easy D-HAT™ 1000 Installation

The D-HAT™ hydrogen on-demand system is an aftermarket device that is safe and easy to install. In most cases from start to finish, it can be installed and fully functional on any semi-tractor or similar size diesel engine in approximately 4-8 hours, minimizing equipment downtime.

The installation process is simple:

  • The D-HAT™ generator is mounted behind the cab or on the chassis rail.
  • The unit is connected to your charging system for power.
  • The hydrogen line is installed, leading to your air intake system.
  • The system uses a Peltier cooling/heating unit.
  • The D-HAT™ generator is wired to the charging system and is controlled via the ignition switch, ensuring the system produces hydrogen only when the diesel engine is running.
  • While each D-HAT™ system is remotely monitored while in operation, a small LCD display can be mounted in the cab, so you can monitor the system from the cockpit.
D-HAT™ Products

No Modifications Required

The D-HAT™ system is non-intrusive, infusing a small amount of hydrogen into the air intake system. There are no modifications made or required to the engine, engine sensors, or air-fuel settings.

Modular Scalability

D-HAT™ systems are modular and can be scaled up to increase hydrogen production. For instance, semi-tractors with 9-15 liter engines require a single D-HAT™ unit. Engines with larger displacements will utilize other D-HAT systems, scaled to meet that engine’s size. D-HAT™ units are completely interchangeable from one engine to another of similar displacement.

Contact Us Today
